summary: Added a simple UI mock (top bar, tabs, headings, and three preview cards) that fades/slides in and is clipped inside the expanding white panel, matching the reference layout feel.

conversationMessages.content: Generated your animation, any follow up edits?
add the contents inside the white layout
Added a simple UI mock (top bar, tabs, headings, and three preview cards) that fades/slides in and is clipped inside the expanding white panel, matching the reference layout feel.

edits.description: Add timing values for content reveal animation
Insert UI contents inside the white layout (clipped to the panel)
edits.old_string:
{/* Expanding white panel behind assets (matches screenshot 2/3 wide canvas) */}
				<div
					style={{
						position: "absolute",
						left: whitePanelX,
						top: whitePanelY,
						width: whitePanelW,
						height: whitePanelH,
						backgroundColor: COLOR_WHITE,
						borderRadius: CARD_RADIUS,
						boxShadow: `0 ${Math.round(height * 0.03)}px ${CARD_SHADOW_BLUR}px ${COLOR_SHADOW}`,
						opacity: whitePanelOpacity,
						transform: `translateZ(0)`,
					}}
				/>
